title: EDA for CIS Fraud Detection
description: In this kernel I will do my EDA on the dataset, make some visualizations, try to find any insights and create some new features. Join me, it promises to be a thrilling adventure. Some tricks being used:  card1 count encoding Covariate Shift features interaction data relaxation  New engineered features:  Number of NaNs TransactionAmt and it's decimal part
description_lemmatized: kernel eda dataset make visualization try find insight create new feature join promise thrilling adventure trick used card1 count encoding covariate shift feature interaction data relaxation new engineered feature number nan transactionamt decimal part
